title: How to watch the Future Games Show at Gamescom livestream
description: Watch reveals and announcements for over 50 games this week.

title: Medieval skydiving is not even the weirdest thing Crimson Desert crammed into this exhaustive new trailer
description: The weirdest thing was playing the pipes for that crowd of little blobs.

title: I'm begging MiHoYo to show me more Zenless Zone Zero than this
description: Is that a Persona-style relationship system?

title: Diablo 4 Season 2 revealed: It's about vampires, and will include some much-requested updates
description: You'll finally be able to hunt for specific Unique items.

title: Gamescom Opening Night Live roundup: every PC game trailer and announcement
description: Here's every game trailer and announcement for games and updates coming to PC.

title: Modern Warfare 3's gameplay reveal was dull, but it also teased something legitimately exciting
description: I want to hear more about Open Combat Missions.

title: Forza Motorsport's 'ideal' system requirements demand an RTX 4080 and an NvME SSD
description: The system requirements for Turn 10's upcoming racing game are pretty steep.

title: One of our favorite action RPGs of 2019 shows off 4 years of updates at Gamescom
description: Last Epoch has come a long way since the last time we looked at it.

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage showcases 'full Arabic voiceover' in a new trailer at Gamescom
description: The next Assassin's Creed game comes out on October 12.

title: An hour under relentless siege by orcs and angry ghosts in the world of Warhammer has me convinced that Realms of Ruin is the next great RTS campaign
description: Understanding the spirit of Frontier's new RTS, thanks to an army of spirits.

title: Fort Solis review
description: A technical showcase in search of a good story

title: Geoff Keighley keeps his cool as Opening Night Live stage crasher closes in: 'That's just so disappointing'
description: "It's just so sad to me to see something like that happen," Keighley said as the men were escorted off stage.

title: Starfield has 'a lot of surprises that we haven't talked about,' Todd Howard says at Gamescom
description: The Starfield game director made his first-ever appearance at Gamescom alongside a brand-new live action trailer.

title: Destiny 2's The Final Shape expansion will add new Arc, Solar and Void supers
description: Bungie blasted out a bunch of new info on what to expect from its big finale and beyond.

title: Immortals of Aveum review
description: A fun magical FPS, but it fails to cast any new spells.

title: Destiny 2 is scrapping its current seasonal model in favour of three 'episodes' per year
description: Bungie says the move away from seasons will enable it to tell bigger, standalone stories.

title: Valheim celebrates the launch of 'hard mode' by offering up a custom-made viking tankard for the fastest and hardest speedrunner
description: The Trial of Tyr is a serious challenge for serious vikings.

title: Konami confuses things further, now says Metal Gear Solid collection will run at 1080p and 60FPS
description: 4K? You'll take what you get and be thankful.

title: Diablo 4's long-desired loot filters are 'definitely part of our backlog', says general manager
description: Loot trash troubles.

title: Where to find Thrumbo in Baldur's Gate 3
description: Help Mystic Carrion locate his lost undead thrall.

title: Half-Life 2 is getting an RTX 'remix' and it looks incredible
description: This is not a drill: It's a crowbar.

title: Microsoft rejigs $69bn Activision Blizzard deal to placate UK regulators, offers all cloud gaming rights to Ubisoft for 15 years
description: Bobby Kotick though says 'nothing substantially changes'.

title: WoW's UI arms race rages on as Blizzard says they'll crack down on sparkly new combat overlays
description: This ain't a deal, it's a light-damned arms race.

title: AMD Ryzen 9 7945HX3D hands-on testing: So, I guess AMD just makes all the best mobile chips now
description: The red team has brought its X3D CPU technology to the gaming laptop and honestly it slaps.

title: The inevitable Half-Life 2 RTX remix is being made without Valve
description: Nvidia's calling it "the most comprehensive graphical remaster of Half-Life 2" and is working with the modding community to make it happen.

title: Nvidia's imminent DLSS 3.5 update will improve ray tracing and performance across all RTX GPUs
description: Bringing AI to bear on those noisy traced rays.

title: D&D's clunky exhaustion rules are in Baldur's Gate 3, but they only apply to one unlucky (and very tired) bird
description: A little bird told me that Larian were toying with the idea before the game's full release.

title: How to escape the Djinni Lamp in Baldur's Gate 3
description: Free yourself from an eternity of confinement.

title: It's-a not me: Voice actor of Mario retires after 27 years
description: Charles Martinet will now be an ambassador for the character.

title: Shirtless halfling legend blows up Baldur's Gate 3's entire goblin camp with hundreds of explosive barrels to classical music
description: Talk about explosive results

title: How to watch Gamescom Opening Night Live 2023
description: Catch the next big livestream of gaming announcements and trailers this week.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #794: Tuesday, August 22
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.
